com.ibm.team.repository.common

Annotation Type AllowAnonymousAccess


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface AllowAnonymousAccess
    Adding this annotation to a Jazz service marks the service as allowing unauthenticated access to the service methods.
    Since:
    0.7

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      boolean attemptOptionalAuthentication
      The attemptOptionalAuthentication attribute is a hint to the servlet whether authentication headers should be processed when handling services with the AllowAnonymousAccess annotation.
      boolean fetchContributor
      The fetch contributor attribute lets the servlet know if the contributor record needs to be fetched.

    • Element Detail

      • attemptOptionalAuthentication

        public abstract boolean attemptOptionalAuthentication
        The attemptOptionalAuthentication attribute is a hint to the servlet whether authentication headers should be processed when handling services with the AllowAnonymousAccess annotation. The value defaults to false to preserve backwards compatibility with code written before this attribute was introduced.

        If the value is false and the incoming request includes OAuth headers, then the headers will not be processed. If the value is true and the incoming request includes OAuth headers, then the servlet will try to process the OAuth headers to discern an authenticated user.

        Since:
        3.0.1.1
        Default:
        false

      • fetchContributor

        public abstract boolean fetchContributor
        The fetch contributor attribute lets the servlet know if the contributor record needs to be fetched. If true, the GUEST user is fetched from the contributor service and the servlet context is setup accordingly. If false, no contributor is fetched and the team service context will not include any information about the user. This allows a request to not depend on the contributor service
        Returns:
        Since:
        4.0
        Default:
        true
